normalized: several hours later――
approximately 2 00 00 kilometres from cordelia.
uranus sector.
led by kiria jeff, the neo terran fleet was arranged in a line abreast formation.
it was a large fleet, comprised of the flagship urbano miralles, three cruisers and fifty destroyers.
at the same time.
cordelia command centre, operations room.
alicia viewstroem was staring in silence at the neo terran fleet that was approaching right now.
transmitted from a reconnaissance satellite, a formidable battle formation was displayed on a gigantic monitor in the command centre.
the officers under alicia's direct control―the top generals of the cordelian army―swallowed their saliva, waiting for her words.
the words of their beautiful commander-in-chief.

name: intelligence officer
normalized: flagship urbano miralles confirmed!

name: intelligence officer
normalized: it seems to be the neo terran fleet that kiria jeff commands!

name: intelligence officer
normalized: it's a large fleet, consisting of three cruisers and fifty destroyers!
it was a larger-scale invasion than ever before.
the command centre was astir due to the reports from the intelligence officers, which came one after another.
and then――
alicia viewstroem, who had been sitting in the commander-in-chief's seat, stood up.
in a very natural motion, which didn't even make her clothes rustle.
regardless, it looked like she was going to stop―no, rebuke the shaken generals.
the command centre fell quiet in an instant.
there were even people who were so nervous that their legs were shaking.
however, there was nobody laughing at that.
her inborn regal majesty made it so.
everyone who looked at her thought.
that, in another age, she would probably have been a great empress and ruled the world.
indeed, they lamented that.
alicia viewstroem.
she was the daughter of count leif viewstroem, the younger brother of grand duke gerd cordelia, who had once governed cordelia.
it was ten years ago that she had appeared on the front stage of history.
grand duke gerd and count leif had been assassinated during the initial chaos after the founding of the space federation.
as the guardian of the grand duke's very young daughter (and successor), maya cordelia, alicia had become the regent.
her activities thereafter were known throughout society.
she guided cordelia, which had been no more than a small frontier nation, into being a powerful military nation which exerted a large influence over the neo terras and the new solars.
since her amazing efforts amounted to the work of a hero, she had now garnered immense trust and respect from the citizens and military officials as a woman with strong charisma.
everyone recognized her royal highness, the regent of cordelia.
a hero, who possessed glamorous beauty and the majesty of a king.
her nickname was the onihime.
after calmly reacting to the respectful eyes that were focused on her, alicia opened her mouth.

name: alicia
normalized: even our cordelia is not monolithic.
sycophants to the powerful exist in every age.
those words reminded the generals of the faces of several influential people in cordelia.
led by alicia, cordelia had quickly built up its strength.
now, they could not stay safe from the effects of the secret feud between the two major powers, the neo terras and the new solars, which engulfed the solar system.

name: general
normalized: then, you mean the neo terras of our own country are plotting something?!

name: general
normalized: traitors!

name: general
normalized: we can't let this slide!
the hot-blooded generals grew lively, but

name: alicia
normalized: that's fine for now.
measures are being taken.
first, shall we think about dealing with our uninvited guests?
the boorish generals all fell silent due to the words of alicia, who calmly admonished them.

name: alicia
normalized: lowbrow neo terras.
they seem to have resorted to firm measures, seeing cordelia become connected with the new solars…
alicia, who carried the fate of her motherland on her shoulders, muttered with a little irritation, but…
the next moment, a burning light appeared in both eyes, and she said,

name: alicia
normalized: the “armoured knights” are ready, correct?

name: officer
normalized: every preparation has been made, your highness!
that was the answer, which seemed to burst forth from one of the officers.

name: alicia
normalized: hmph…
alicia expressed a daring smile due to her subordinates' attitude, which seemed like they had been waiting for this.
armoured knight――that was the name of a weapon that only cordelia possessed, and which had been the driving force that led to cordelia being a military power.
it had originally been developed as the basis of their strategy for 『infantry in the cordelian space army』.
many planetary belts existed around cordelia.
they had sought infantry-like weapons that, on top of making use of that locational advantage, could move freely through space.
alicia had displayed a natural talent for the development of that military technology.
and what they had completed was the armoured knight null.
height: 7.
width: 4.
weight: 6.
it was a humanoid mobile weapon that deviated from the norm.

its little body was furnished with a deuterium nuclear fusion reactor for power, just like the ones in federation army space warships, and its armour was endowed with the strength of a mid-size battleship, thanks to the uranos alloy of which cordelia boasted.
it used exclusive handheld firearms―which, likewise, rivalled the armaments of mid-size battleships―and all sorts of other optional weapons, and drove quickly through space at will.
alicia herself had participated in a search-and-destroy operation against a jupiter sector military faction for the space federation (which became their debut battle) as the commanding knight pilot.

they had shocked the universe, seriously damaging or destroying 1 battleship, 2 cruisers and 6 destroyers of the faction (which were no less heavily armoured than the regular army) with only 2 platoons of 6 knights, and without losing even a single one.
alicia viewstroem―as well as being the cordelian army's commander-in- chief, she was also a space valkyrie who moved across battlefields as she pleased in the strongest armoured knight.

name: officer
normalized: all “armoured knights” are ready for takeoff at any time, your highness!

name: alicia
normalized: good.
now…
just when alicia was about to give the order,
hime nee-sama!
a refined young voice resounded in the command centre.

name: alicia
normalized: good timing as always, maya.
alicia made a gentle smile that she didn't show to other people, and greeted the owner of that voice.
voices saying 『maya-sama!
』 and 『your majesty!
』 came from all around.
all of the people in the command centre, who were sitting in rows, respectfully bowed in unison.

name: maya
normalized: this is an emergency.
looks like everyone is concentrating on their duties.
the girl who had appeared, clad in the majesty and kindness characteristic of a noble, was maya cordelia.
she was the daughter of the previous grand duke, gerd cordelia.
gerd had no children except for maya, and, in spite of being a woman, she was the prince who would succeed the position of grand duke of cordelia.

after gerd's death, the position of grand duke of cordelia had been vacant, but, when the day came that maya reached a suitable age, she would officially inherit the grand duke's throne, and (counting from the earth era) become the 52nd-generation grand duchess of cordelia.
with great expectations pinned on her by alicia, who had become her guardian, she was a princess, who, like alicia, was tremendously popular among her people and subjects.

name: alicia
normalized: maya, we're in the middle of an operation right now.
alicia told maya, who had appeared in the command centre without prior notice, as if scolding her.
however, contrary to her words, a gentle gleam was suspended in her eyes, as though she were looking at her biological sister.

name: maya
normalized: yeah, hime nee-sama's mission was just about to begin.
that's why i hurried over.

name: alicia
normalized: “that's why”?

name: maya
normalized: ufufu.
maya made a childish smile at alicia, who knit her brows quizzically.

name: maya
normalized: you haven't forgotten your promise about my first battle, have you, hime nee-sama?
she said, cocking her head and looking into alicia's eyes.

name: alicia
normalized: …mm.
alicia hesitated to speak, as if she had touched on a sore point.
seeing that unladylike behaviour, maya made a throaty laugh, and

name: maya
normalized: good.
i was worried you might forget, hime nee-sama.

name: alicia
normalized: it's not that i've forgotten, but…

name: maya
normalized: well, are you saying that my skill is lacking?

name: alicia
normalized: no, maya is comparable to a veteran pilot, i assure you.
alicia answered clearly, though seeming not to want to say too much.

name: maya
normalized: in that case, please make sure to keep your promise.

name: alicia
normalized: but, maya…
alicia's expression looked like she was hesitating over what to say.

name: maya
normalized: hime nee-sama.
maya suddenly sent her a serious look.

name: maya
normalized: please answer as regent of the duchy of cordelia, and commander-in- chief of her army.

name: alicia
normalized: …hmph.
alicia withstood maya's look for a long while, then sighed as if she had been worn down.

name: alicia
normalized: maya, i don't want to let you do anything too dangerous.
her face looked exasperated by maya, for having gone out of her way to make her say that, and by herself, for having said it.

name: maya
normalized: 『maya, a coward who hides behind soldiers is not fit to be the leader of cordelia.
it should be someone who always flies through space, spearheading the troops.

name: maya
normalized: i wonder who it was that taught me that, hime nee-sama?
laughter filled their surroundings, due to maya rather childishly mimicking alicia's tone of voice.

name: alicia
normalized: dear, dear.
alicia said, as if she were exasperated again.

name: alicia
normalized: understood.
it's my loss, maya cordelia.
as promised, today will be your first battle.
but don't leave my side!

name: maya
normalized: yes!
maya's happy-sounding reply burst out.
the soldiers' cheers enveloped it.

name: soldier
normalized: it's our maya-sama's first battle!

name: soldier
normalized: witness the goddess of war!
the first battle of cordelia's majestic princess!

name: soldier
normalized: her royal highness alicia is always on the front line too!

name: soldier
normalized: let's show off our power to the cowardly generals of the neo terras, who are confined to the earth!
joining in with the soldiers, who were eager to fight, alicia, utterly calmly,

name: alicia

gave the order, which seemed to resonate clearly.
